archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.3.5: Information, and application source code used within development environments (including software under development, information used in the development process and important system documentation) should be protected against unauthorised:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
